data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

In order to always face forward, you must always take 9 steps left. In order to always face forward, you must always take 10 steps forward. In order to always face right- side, you must always take 9 steps right. In order to always take back-wards, you must always take 10 steps backward. So, the answer is yes.
